keys.string: As I knocked on the door, I could hear yelling from the room. I could hear some stumbling in the room and footsteps headed towards the door. Danny opens it to reveal himself.
Oh! Hello again, [NAME]! I’m just gaming again, but don’t mind me! If I’ve been yelling, then I apologize. I’ve been trying out this new game, Dank Spirits, and it’s been giving me a rough time!
This early in the morning though?
Well. Sometimes I wake up early, and once I get all my morning rituals done, I just play some games if I have time before class starts. Is that a problem?
Danny is squinting his eyes at me, curious as to what I’m about to say next. I open my mouth, about to say something, but then I close my mouth and shake my head.
Sorry. Didn’t mean to be rude, but I get what you mean. Anyway, it’s about time for us to head to class. You go on ahead, I gotta shut down my computer.
Danny waves me off, and I proceed to walk to Oliver…

ArrayOfString.string: [Narrator][Dialog]As I knocked on the door, I could hear yelling from the room. I could hear some stumbling in the room and footsteps headed towards the door. Danny opens it to reveal himself.

[Danny][Dialog]Oh! Hello again, [NAME]! I’m just gaming again, but don’t mind me! If I’ve been yelling, then I apologize. I’ve been trying out this new game, Dank Spirits, and it’s been giving me a rough time!
[Danny][Dialog]Well. Sometimes I wake up early, and once I get all my morning rituals done, I just play some games if I have time before class starts. Is that a problem?
[Narrator][Dialog]Danny is squinting his eyes at me, curious as to what I’m about to say next. I open my mouth, about to say something, but then I close my mouth and shake my head.
[Danny][Dialog]Sorry. Didn’t mean to be rude, but I get what you mean. Anyway, it’s about time for us to head to class. You go on ahead, I gotta shut down my computer.
[Narrator][Dialog]Danny waves me off, and I proceed to walk to Oliver…
